You did It!

According to Orange County Utilities, 6,000 tons of materials are collected for recycling each month. Due to contaminated items being placed in with your recyclables, only 15% of that 6,000 tons can be actually converted into usable materials.

You may have noticed how significantly smaller your returns got once you got down to sorting your materials, Thatâ€™s the 15% of usable materials! So, what cant be recycled?

  • Pizza boxes
  • Grocery bag
  • Scrap metal
  • Plastic buckets
  • Yard waste
  • Straws
  • Styrofoam egg containers
  • To-go boxes
  • Straws
  • Bags of dog food
  • Fertilizer bags
  • Paint cans, spray paint, any hazardous waste
